visual.name: Ultimate Waterfall (API)
visual.description: The Ultimate Waterfall Chart supports horizontal and vertical orientation, small multiples, sub totals and many more features. Custom colors for contribution, sub totals and totals. More Details http://dataviz.boutique/

axisToggle.description: Switch between horizontal and landscape orientations

customBarColorToggle.displayName: Show Custom Color for All Bars

highlight4.displayName: Highlight for Total and Last Bar

highlight5.displayName: Highlight for Last and Second Last Bar
